title: reg-mni305.2mm
description: Computes the registration between the FreeSurfer MNI305 2mm space and a subject's FreeSurfer anatomical space.

subject_id.title: Subject ID
subject_id.description: Subject ID for the FreeSurfer anatomical space.

regfile.title: Registration file
regfile.description: tkregister2-style registration matrix file (should have a .dat or .reg extension).
